wikipedia_page.main: Richard Goddard-Crawley (born 31 March 1978) is an English retired semi-professional footballer who played as a midfielder in the Football League for Brentford. After his release in 1998, he had a 10-year career in non-League football.

response: * Richard Goddard-Crawley (born 1978), British semi-professional association football midfielder
